title: "Enorm Klein" receives "Certificate of Typographic Excellence"
content:
The booklet “Enorm Klein” has been selected by the TDC judges to receive the “Certificate of Typographic Excellence”!  
More information about the booklet: [http://www.caketype.com/books/enorm\_klein/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421094633/http:/www.caketype.com/books/enorm_klein/index.html "http://www.caketype.com/books/enorm\_klein/index.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150421094633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/enorm_klein_6438.jpg)

Pieter
author: Pieter van Rosmalen

comments.content: Congratulations Pieter! Is that front laser-cut?

Thanks Wouter. Yes, the dust-jacket is laser-cut.

Pieter
